blogPost.excerpt: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.

previous.excerpt: We are a company that helps entrepreneurs and SMEs outsource their work. Visit www.GetCallers.com to find out how businesses can leverage our agents for as low as $5/hour to generate leads for them, set appointments, remote admin tasks, and much more.
previous.title: Get Callers - Appointment setting and calling for $5/hour

localize.description: 我们是一家帮助企业家和中小企业外包工作的公司。访问www.GetCallers.com，了解企业如何以低至5美元/小时的价格利用我们的代理为他们创造潜在客户、设置预约、远程管理任务等。
localize.tagline: 预约和打电话，每小时5美元

localize.description: 我們是一家幫助企業家和中小企業外包工作的公司。訪問www.GetCallers.com，瞭解企業如何以低至5美元/小時的價格利用我們的代理爲他們創造潛在客戶、設置預約、遠程管理任務等。
localize.tagline: 預約和打電話，每小時5美元

next.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
next.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的声音的健身会员。您可以获得关于您的口语风格的即时反馈，并随着时间的推移追踪您的进步。个性化的活动帮助您在每天5分钟内培养新技能。您很快就会变得自信满满。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.动力公共演讲和主持人教练)

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.動力公共演講和主持人教練)
